examples: The manager played his strongest side of the season.
The bedside radio played softly.
The media, as always, played an important part in the election campaign.
Fathers play a crucial role in their children's upbringing and development.
His dedication and hard work played a big part in the company's success.
words.defineEn: to enjoy yourself and do things for fun, like children
words.defineVi: để tận hưởng bản thân và làm những điều cho vui, giống như trẻ em

examples: The children played games in the yard.
Three cheers for Sarah, whose brilliant goal at the last minute won us the game!
The game strikes a great balance between accessibility for younger players and a rewarding challenge for veterans of the genre.
A large crowd watched the game on Saturday.
Two could play at that game, smart guy.
words.defineEn: an activity often with fixed rules that we do for amusement or fun
words.defineVi: một hoạt động thường với các quy tắc cố định mà chúng tôi làm để giải trí hoặc vui vẻ

examples: Does this pub do lunches?
Does this pub do lunches?
Does the price include tax?
Microprocessors do the calculations in the twinkling of an eye.
The gang did a warehouse and a supermarket.
words.defineEn: to perform a particular activity or task
words.defineVi: để thực hiện một hoạt động cụ thể hoặc nhiệm vụ

examples: He placed the puzzle pieces back into the puzzle box.
He placed the puzzle pieces back into the puzzle box.
Sometimes he spoke straight from the shoulder and sometimes in puzzles
He scratched his head, puzzled by the difficult math problem.
She had a fast mind and could quickly solve puzzles.
words.defineEn: a game that needs a lot of thinking in order to be finished or done
words.defineVi: một trò chơi cần rất nhiều suy nghĩ để hoàn thành hoặc thực hiện

examples: The Siemens display goes the whole hog.
The cruise went very quickly.
My laptop went haywire
To go swimming/fishing/jogging.
The email went to everyone in the company.
words.defineEn: to travel or move from one location to another location
words.defineVi: để đi du lịch hoặc di chuyển từ một địa điểm đến một địa điểm khác

examples: He carries a gym bag with his workout clothes and water bottle.
I always go to the gym before work.
We have a home gym downstairs for exercising and staying fit.
Lisa hits the gym regularly to stay in shape and maintain her physical fitness.
Jennifer had been harboring the hots for her gym instructor, Alex.
words.defineEn: a place with special equipment that people go to exercise or play sports
words.defineVi: một nơi có thiết bị đặc biệt mà mọi người đi tập thể dục hoặc chơi thể thao

examples: That hot guy had a good head on his shoulders.
The hotel had expensive rates during the holiday season.
The group has a new CD in the pipeline.
The police had the situation well in hand.
The theatre company has several new productions in the pipeline for next season.
words.defineEn: to hold, possess, or own an object or a quality
words.defineVi: để giữ, sở hữu, hoặc sở hữu một đối tượng hoặc một chất lượng

words.defineEn: a period of time spent resting or sleeping in bed beyond one's usual waking time, often done for the purpose of getting additional rest or relaxation
words.defineVi: một khoảng thời gian dành cho việc nghỉ ngơi hoặc ngủ trên giường ngoài thời gian thức dậy thông thường của một người, thường được thực hiện với mục đích nghỉ ngơi hoặc thư giãn thêm

examples: The committee meets once a fortnight.
The car met the bus head-on.
He met his death in 1946.
I meet my study group at the library on Tuesday afternoons.
We usually meet at the coffee shop on Fridays.
words.defineEn: to come together in a place with others to do something special
words.defineVi: đến với nhau ở một nơi với những người khác để làm điều gì đó đặc biệt

examples: Friends shared a platter of crispy chicken wings with tangy dipping sauces at the sports bar.
The new student quickly made friends with the other musicians, because birds of a feather flock together.
My friends enjoyed tangy barbecue gammon skewers at the summer barbecue.
My friend prefers a vegetarian sandwich with avocado and sprouts.
My friends enjoyed smoky beef rib chops at the countryside barbecue.
words.defineEn: someone we know well, like a lot, and trust, but normally they are not part of our family
words.defineVi: một người mà chúng ta biết rõ, rất thích và tin tưởng, nhưng thông thường họ không phải là một phần của gia đình chúng ta

examples: The children drank their juice from colorful plastic glasses.
My parents always drink orange juice for breakfast.
Get a drink for John.
I usually drink a cup of green tea in the afternoon.
My brother always drinks smoothie after exercising.
words.defineEn: any liquid that we can drink
words.defineVi: bất kỳ chất lỏng nào chúng ta có thể uống

examples: Watch your mouth!
The girls watched the development of this relationship with incredulity.
A large crowd watched the game on Saturday.
Watch your head on the low ceiling.
Watch me!
words.defineEn: to look at a thing or person and pay attention to it for some time
words.defineVi: để nhìn vào một điều hoặc người và chú ý đến nó trong một thời gian

examples: My friend has been dealing with a lot of family drama lately, but I reminded her that we all have our crosses to bear and to take it one day at a time.
In a political drama, when a new scandal or revelation is exposed, the plot thickens as the characters must navigate new challenges and conflicts.
Getting involved in a toxic relationship may provide the thrill of drama and excitement, but it can also lead to emotional abuse, manipulation, and heartbreak.
By staying out of drama and avoiding negative talk, I've been able to maintain positive relationships with those around me.
This first diner overhears the drama right away.
words.defineEn: a play that is performed in a theater, on TV, or radio
words.defineVi: một vở kịch được thực hiện trong một nhà hát, trên TV, hoặc đài phát thanh

examples: Cable TV reaches a huge audience.
The TV quiz was more fun than a barrel of monkeys!
The TV stays on all day in their house.
Millions of people followed the trial on TV.
She regularly appears on TV.
words.defineEn: an electronic device that shows images and videos and plays sounds and people use to watch different programs
words.defineVi: một thiết bị điện tử hiển thị hình ảnh và video và phát âm thanh và mọi người sử dụng để xem các chương trình khác nhau

examples: To have a chat/a conversation/a discussion/a talk.
They stayed up chatting about this and that.
Her grandchild lives in another country, but they video chat every week to stay in touch.
As the school bell rang, the boys rushed out of the classroom, laughing and chatting with their friends.
Sorry, but I can't stay to chat.
words.defineEn: to talk in an informal and friendly way to someone, usually about unimportant things
words.defineVi: nói chuyện một cách thân mật và thân thiện với ai đó, thường là về những điều không quan trọng

examples: Will you get the phone?
Your phone is ringing for the thousandth time.
The phone rang and broke my train of thought.
I have my phone to thank for my lack of sleep last night.
The phone lead isn’t long enough to reach the bedroom.
words.defineEn: an electronic device used to talk to a person who is at a different location
words.defineVi: một thiết bị điện tử được sử dụng để nói chuyện với một người đang ở một địa điểm khác

words.defineEn: to leave the house to go somewhere, usually to do something enjoyable
words.defineVi: rời khỏi nhà để đi đâu đó, thường là để làm điều gì đó thú vị

examples: Good wine can make a meal.
The chef cooks a delicious meal in the restaurant.
Meals can be served to you in your room.
She cooked a delicious meal in the kitchen.
She enjoys cooking meals for her family in the kitchen of their home.
words.defineEn: the food that you eat on regular occasions during the day, especially breakfast, lunch, or dinner; or any of these occasions
words.defineVi: thức ăn mà bạn ăn thường xuyên trong ngày, đặc biệt là bữa sáng, bữa trưa hoặc bữa tối; hoặc bất kỳ dịp nào trong số này

examples: listen to our problems.
Listen Jane.
I listened carefully to her story.
Don’t listen to Jerry.
Don't listen to him.
words.defineEn: to give our attention to the sound a person or thing is making
words.defineVi: để cung cấp cho sự chú ý của chúng tôi đến âm thanh một người hoặc điều đang làm

examples: Can you read music?
The music was far too loud for my liking.
Her words were music to my ears.
Set this poem to music.
That music really gets me.
words.defineEn: a series of sounds made by instruments or voices, arranged in a way that is pleasant or exciting to listen to
words.defineVi: một loạt âm thanh được tạo ra bởi các nhạc cụ hoặc giọng nói, được sắp xếp theo cách dễ chịu hoặc thú vị để nghe

examples: Does this pub do lunches?
Does this pub do lunches?
Does the price include tax?
Microprocessors do the calculations in the twinkling of an eye.
The gang did a warehouse and a supermarket.
words.defineEn: to perform an action or activity that is not mentioned by name
words.defineVi: để thực hiện một hành động hoặc hoạt động không được đề cập theo tên

examples: Money means nothing to him.
Nothing is forever.
Hold nothing back.
Their performance was nothing to write home about.
This argument has nothing to do with me.
words.defineEn: not a single thing
words.defineVi: không phải là một điều duy nhất

words.defineEn: to use a device like a camera or cellphone to capture an image of something
words.defineVi: để sử dụng một thiết bị như máy ảnh hoặc điện thoại di động để chụp ảnh của một cái gì đó

examples: Generally, the article reads very well.
My son reads twelve pages of his book every day.
Read my lips.
Read my lips.
Teachers should read more poetry to children.
words.defineEn: to look at written or printed words and understand their meaning
words.defineVi: nhìn vào các từ được viết hoặc in và hiểu ý nghĩa của chúng

examples: The magazine features interviews with musicians and reviews of new albums.
The magazine has an article about famous celebrities and their lifestyles.
The magazine keeps tabs on the latest fashion trends.
The articles in this magazine are a cut above the others.
I often read parenting magazines to get advice on raising my children.
words.defineEn: a periodic publication or a large thin book with a paper cover that contains news stories, articles, photographs, etc., usually on a particular topic, sold weekly or monthly
words.defineVi: một ấn phẩm định kỳ hoặc một cuốn sách mỏng lớn có bìa giấy chứa các câu chuyện tin tức, bài báo, ảnh, v.v., thường về một chủ đề cụ thể, được bán hàng tuần hoặc hàng tháng

examples: We sometimes have a barbecue in the backyard.
My friends enjoyed tangy barbecue gammon skewers at the summer barbecue.
My friends enjoyed tangy barbecue gammon skewers at the summer barbecue.
My friends enjoyed smoky beef rib chops at the countryside barbecue.
They grilled marinated fryer chicken skewers at the backyard barbecue.
words.defineEn: an outdoor meal or party during which food (meat, fish, etc.) is cooked on a metal frame over an open fire
words.defineVi: một bữa ăn hoặc bữa tiệc ngoài trời trong đó thức ăn (thịt, cá, v.v.) được nấu trên khung kim loại trên ngọn lửa trần

examples: She wears her hair long.
This policy is no longer an effective means to an end.
Our players kept the pedal to the metal all season long.
The kids are under my feet all day long.
North Korea’s refusal had long been a sticking point.
words.defineEn: (of two points) having an above-average or big distance between them
words.defineVi: (của hai điểm) có khoảng cách trên trung bình hoặc lớn giữa chúng

examples: A true leader walks the talk.
The old lady walked slowly with the support of her cane.
The father proudly walked his daughter down the aisle on her wedding day.
They walk their dogs every day.
She walked the horse around the ring.
words.defineEn: a short journey we take on foot
words.defineVi: một hành trình ngắn chúng ta đi bộ

examples: They visit their grandmother every weekend.
We sometimes visit our relatives during the holidays.
They often visit their grandparents on weekends.
We usually visit our grandparents during the holidays.
We visited a local smokehouse renowned for its mouthwatering brisket.
words.defineEn: to go somewhere because we want to spend time with someone
words.defineVi: đi đâu đó vì chúng ta muốn dành thời gian với ai đó

examples: The city has put the brakes on further spending.
The band are playing 11 cities around the country.
The company are playing 11 cities around the country.
The book paints a vivid picture of life in the city.
The city of Paris lies on the banks of the Seine River.
words.defineEn: a larger and more populated town
words.defineVi: một thị trấn lớn hơn và đông dân cư hơn

examples: Many shops have raised their prices.
Her father kept a grocer's shop.
The shopkeeper closed the shop for a short break.
He and his fellow workers would incessantly talk shop in the village pub.
The big fellow keeps a fish shop near the post office.
words.defineEn: to look for and buy different things from stores
words.defineVi: để tìm kiếm và mua những thứ khác nhau từ các cửa hàng

examples: Put your clothes in the cupboard.
She gave him presents and clothes.
All clothes are in mint condition and less than two years old.
She received many compliments on her stylish clothes.
My clothes won't all go in that one suitcase.
words.defineEn: the things we wear to cover our body, such as pants, shirts, and jackets
words.defineVi: những thứ chúng ta mặc để che thân, chẳng hạn như quần, áo sơ mi và áo khoác

examples: The compass needle always points north.
The problem has now reached crisis point.
I take your point.
No point in spoiling the ship for a ha'porth of tar
The line cuts the circle at two points.
words.defineEn: the most important thing that is said or done which highlights the purpose of something
words.defineVi: điều quan trọng nhất được nói hoặc làm làm nổi bật mục đích của một cái gì đó

words.defineEn: to make an attempt to achieve or do something
words.defineVi: để thực hiện một nỗ lực để đạt được hoặc làm một cái gì đó

examples: This suit is a steal at $80.
Part-time work would suit me right down to the ground.
He paired his suit with polished dress shoes.
That job would suit you to a tee.
My dad bought a stylish suit for his friend's wedding.
words.defineEn: (of a style of clothes, color, etc.) to look good on someone
words.defineVi: (về kiểu quần áo, màu sắc, v.v.) trông đẹp mắt với ai đó

words.defineEn: to choose not to communicate or interact with other people
words.defineVi: chọn không giao tiếp hoặc tương tác với người khác

examples: Both men wore confident smiles.
She felt confident and beautiful in her new swimsuit.
I'm confident that the new restaurant will go like a bomb and become a popular dining destination.
And nothing was so irritating as the confident way he used archaic idiom.
During the chess tournament, Jane was confident in her skills, but her opponent ended up cleaning her clock with a series of surprising moves.
words.defineEn: being certain about our plans, abilities, the future, etc. and believing that we can gain success
words.defineVi: chắc chắn về kế hoạch, khả năng, tương lai của mình, v.v. và tin rằng chúng ta có thể đạt được thành công

examples: I need to go round to the grocery store to buy some food.
This was one of those debates which simply went round in circles.
We decided to go round the city and see what it had to offer.
It's an unavoidable truth that money and commerce make the world go round.
When the community came together to support those affected by the natural disaster, it was a reminder that love makes the world go round.
words.defineEn: to visit or go to someone's place or residence, often for social or friendly purposes
words.defineVi: đến thăm hoặc đi đến địa điểm hoặc nơi cư trú của ai đó, thường vì mục đích xã hội hoặc thân thiện
